@RuneScape @JagexRyan @JagexYuey @JagexAzanna 

Kravy hosted the first Golden Daredevil in Leagues! Congratulations everyone!

We've updated the Combat Achievement tracker to include Amascut, the Devourer!

https://t.co/FOZihRgM7z

Head to 'File' and 'Make a Copy' to start your own! Unorthodox and Perfect on their own tab too!

@RuneScape @JagexYuey @JagexAzanna @JagexRyan https://t.co/Iq6bEh3Spz
